history.proof: intros u. unfold opp. scongruence use: scal_opp_l, scal_one unfold: opp.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of opp_mult_m1 (opp _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of scal_opp_r (scal _ (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of scal_one (scal one _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring V : ModuleSpace K u : V Unable to unify "AbelianGroup.opp V (AbelianGroup.class V) u" with "scal (AbelianGroup.opp K (AbelianGroup.class K) one) u".

original: intros u. unfold opp. rewrite opp_mult_m1. rewrite scal_opp_r. rewrite scal_one. reflexivity.
